typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		column1 as short,
		column2 as short,
		column3 as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		minValue as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> minValueSource
source(output(
		maxValue as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> maxValueSource
source1, minValueSource lookup(column1 > minValue
	&& column2 > minValue
	&& column3 > minValue,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'right',
	pickup: 'any')~> Lookup1
Filter1, maxValueSource lookup(column1 < maxValue
	&& column2 < maxValue
	&& column3 < maxValue,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'right')~> Lookup2
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(minValue)) ~> Filter1
Lookup2 filter(!isNull(maxValue)) ~> Filter2
Filter2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		column1,
		column2,
		column3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
